Class JavaHtmlLine

java.lang.Object
  JavaHtmlLine
public class JavaHtmlLine
extends java.lang.Object

The JavaHtmlLine class translates Java line to HTML JavaHtml using the rules:

  1. Any each tab and space at the start of the line becomes a &nbsp;
  2. Each < in the line becomes a &lt;
  3. Each > in the line becomes a &gt;
  4. Each & in the line becomes a &amp;
  5. The line has <BR> appended to it

Version:
$Id: JavaHtmlLine.html,v 1.1 2005/03/13 20:02:54 jason Exp $
Author:
Jason Schwarz (Jason_Schwarz@ncsu.edu)
